thread.section_title: Cler Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Parisian Comfort
thread.title_full: Parisian Comfort - Review of Cler Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: claudinep315
title: Parisian Comfort
text: The location was excellent. Very close to several Metro stations, bus stops, and most important is its proximity to the Eiffel Tower. The ambience of the hotel was so homey and one would look forward to go back to the hotel after a long day of sightseeing. Staff were helpful and accommodating. Breakfast was reasonably priced and had decent selections. Will definitely stay during my next trip to Paris.
